TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUpgradeActionCollection implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IUpgradeAction>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IUpgradeAction>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IUpgradeAction>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示功能升级操作的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of feature upgrade actions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IAddContentTypeFieldUpgradeAction AddAddContentTypeFieldUpgradeAction() cil managed

summary.span: 将新的 操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

span.span: Adds a new action to the feature upgrade actions collection.

returns.span: 添加到集合的新升级操作。

span.span: The new upgrade action added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当将新字段添加到的内容类型，你应以编程方式将字段添加到现有内容类型中。When adding a new field to a content type, you should programmatically add the field to existing content types. 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IApplyElementManifestsUpgradeAction AddApplyElementManifestsUpgradeAction() cil managed

summary.span: 将新的 升级操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

span.span: Adds a new upgrade action to the feature upgrade actions collection.

returns.span: 添加到集合的新升级操作。

span.span: The new upgrade action added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的字段定义为包含功能的新的激活设置。New field definitions are provisioned for new activations of the containing feature. 功能的现有激活不会自动获取新的字段定义，因此功能必须强制重新激活通过使用代码可以接收的任何更改。Existing activations of the feature do not automatically get new field definitions, so features must be force-reactivated by using code to receive any changes. 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将映射到 Office 14 文件夹 Office 12 文件夹中的非自定义的文件。Maps an uncustomized file from the Office 12 folder to the Office 14 folder. 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IVersionRange AddVersionRange() cil managed

summary.span: 将新的 升级操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

span.span: Adds a new upgrade action to the feature upgrade actions collection.
An object representing a version range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定在元素中的升级操作应仅对指定的版本范围内的应用。Specifies that the upgrade actions in the element should applied only for the specified version range. 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
